snippet: Russell A. Harding, an aide to Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani who pleaded guilty to embezzlement and possessing child pornography in 2005, wrote about plans for his death.
abstract: Russell A Harding, former Housing Development Corporation head whose tenure ended in disgrace in 2005, posted a final blog entry in September, chronicling his fall from grace and his plans for suicide; by the time the 3,000-word entry was posted on Sept 30, Harding, 48, had taken his own life.

byline.contributor: Colin Moynihan contributed reporting from Dobbs Ferry, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: Russell A. Harding, an aide to Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani who pleaded guilty to embezzlement and possessing child pornography in 2005, wrote about plans for his death.

headline.seo: Russell Harding’s Blog Chronicled His Fall From Grace and Plans for Suicide
headline.main: Former City Official’s Blog Chronicled His Fall From Grace and Plans for Suicide
headline.print_headline: Former City Official’s Blog Chronicled His Fall From Grace and Plans for Suicide
